an4.96:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya patipanno hoti no parahitaya?
an4.96:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana ragavinayaya patipanno hoti, no param ragavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:2.3: attana dosavinayaya patipanno hoti, no param dosavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:2.4: attana mohavinayaya patipanno hoti, no param mohavinayaya samadapeti.
an4.96:2.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an4.96:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya?
an4.96:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana na ragavinayaya patipanno hoti, param ragavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:3.3: attana na dosavinayaya patipanno hoti, param dosavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:3.4: attana na mohavinayaya patipanno hoti, param mohavinayaya samadapeti.
an4.96:3.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya.
an4.96:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya?
an4.96:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana na ragavinayaya patipanno hoti, no param ragavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:4.3: attana na dosavinayaya patipanno hoti, no param dosavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:4.4: attana na mohavinayaya patipanno hoti, no param mohavinayaya samadapeti.
an4.96:4.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an4.96:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno hoti parahitaya ca?
an4.96:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana ca ragavinayaya patipanno hoti, paranca ragavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:5.3: attana ca dosavinayaya patipanno hoti, paranca dosavinayaya samadapeti;
an4.96:5.4: attana ca mohavinayaya patipanno hoti, paranca mohavinayaya samadapeti.
an4.96:5.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno hoti parahitaya ca.
an4.96:5.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
